DOC.brief_summary: This study is a prospective, multi-center registry of patients with intracranial aneurysms who are treated by the PC 400 System. Data for each patient are collected up to 12 Â± 3 months post-procedure for the study.
DOC.brief_title: A Volumetric Coiling in Aneurysm Registry of the Penumbra Coil 400TM System in France
DOC.criteria: Patients older than 18 years Intracranial aneurysms >2mm, ruptured or unruptured Fusiform aneurysms Dissecting aneurysms Aneurysms associated with brain AVMs Multiple aneurysms Retreated aneurysms Patients in whom endovascular embolization therapies other than PC 400 System are used will be excluded from this study. However, adjunctive use of balloon and stent are acceptable.
